name: mcp-server-sdlxliff
description: Read, review, and edit SDL Trados SDLXLIFF translation files with Claude. Supports inline tag preservation, pagination, and atomic saves with backup.
long_description:
An MCP server for working with SDLXLIFF translation files (SDL Trados Studio format). Features include:

- Extract translation segments with source/target text and status
- Update translations with automatic tag preservation
- Paginated reading for large files
- Atomic writes with automatic backup
- Statistics and segment filtering

Designed for use with Claude Cowork to review and correct translations.

tools.name: read_sdlxliff
tools.description: Extract translation segments from an SDLXLIFF file with pagination support

tools.name: get_sdlxliff_segment
tools.description: Get a specific segment by ID

tools.name: update_sdlxliff_segment
tools.description: Update a segment's target text with tag preservation

tools.name: save_sdlxliff
tools.description: Save changes to the SDLXLIFF file

tools.name: get_sdlxliff_statistics
tools.description: Get statistics about the translation file

tools.name: qa_check_sdlxliff
tools.description: Run QA checks: punctuation, numbers, spacing, brackets, repetition consistency
